name: Monochrome (Fire Feather Games Studio)
description:
Many years ago a boy urges to become a warrior to defend his village. Without any masters left to teach him, he seeks for the Spirit of the Woods whom, legends says, planted the Endless Tree to train those with pure heart and open-minded.

Controls:

 - Left and Right arrows.

Upcoming: Zen Mode, Story Mode, Settings, Credits and beautiful things in the scenario.

If you enjoy the game support me by sharing it and donating so I can pay for the licenses to publish my games in other platforms and pursue the indie dev dream.
